name: Sabertooth Multiplayer Survival Simulator
description:
NEW!!**Now with MULTIPLAYER** Total app overhaul

The Sabertooth Tiger comes back from extinction, straight to the latest high action game for your mobile device. Battle against Mammoths, Polar Bears, Moose, Deer, and Penguins. Take him hunting for wild animals and defend your territory against other Sabertooth Tigers. This animal simulator has been designed for all ages.

Features:
--Real-Time Multplayer
--Challenge your friends online
--Huge Polar Arctic Ice Age Snow Map
--9 Tundra Ice Age Animals included
--4 Different Times of Day, plus snow and rain
--Upgrade your Tiger Strength, Stamina, and Speed.


DYNAMIC ENVIRONMENT
Every time you play the game it will be a different experience. The animals, weather, and time of day is constantly changing.
UPGRADE YOUR SABERTOOTH
When you hunt, you will earn meat units. These meat units can be used to purchase upgrades for your Crocodile.
TALLY YOUR SUCCESS
A special feature in the app allows you to keep a record of your hunting success.
HEAD TO HEAD BATTLE SCENARIOS
Challenge your fighting skills against 6 different 3 on 1 battles. Be prepared for a flight for survival. You either win or loose.
9 SNOW ANIMALS INCLUDED
Hunt down animals like Rabbit, Buffalo, Mammoth, Deer, Moose, and Bears.
3D ICE AGE GAMEPLAY
Addictive and fun controls for hours of awesome animal simulation.
This Sabertooth Tiger Simulator has been designed with all ages in mind.
